name: Pad Mee Recipe (Vermicelli Noodles Stir-Fry)
description: Pad mee is a classic Thai stir-fry that comes together in under 20 minutes for an effortlessly light and delicious meal.

recipeInstructions.text: Soak your rice vermicelli in water according to package instructions. Drain afterward.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak your rice vermicelli in water according to package instructions. Drain afterward.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oil in a wok over medium-high heat and toss in chopped garlic. Stir until golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat oil in a wok over medium-high heat and toss in chopped garlic. Stir until golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Crack in the eggs and scramble them until they're just set.
recipeInstructions.name: Crack in the eggs and scramble them until they're just set.

recipeInstructions.text: Add your drained noodles to the wok and mix them with the egg. Add the stir-fry sauces with white sugar and keep stir-frying until the noodles are well coated with sauce and sugar dissolves. Stir in the green onions with a final stir and serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Add your drained noodles to the wok and mix them with the egg. Add the stir-fry sauces with white sugar and keep stir-frying until the noodles are well coated with sauce and sugar dissolves. Stir in the green onions with a final stir and serve immediately.

review.reviewBody:
Wat een goede kok ben jij toch en het lijkt mij altijd met zeer  een liefde gemaakt.
Prettige kerstdagen en een voorspoedig en gezond 2024 voor jou, 
Gianni en jouw hele familie!

keywords: pad mee, pad sen mee, rice vermicelli, stir-fried rice vermicelli
